events.name: Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The growing adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) is driven by technological advancements, environmental concerns, and policy incentives, with EV batteries playing a crucial role in determining the range and cost of the vehicles. This event examines the structure and dynamics of the EV battery supply chain, trade data limitations, and value addition in different regions.
events.description: The growing adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) is driven by technological advancements, environmental concerns, and policy incentives, with EV batteries playing a crucial role in determining the range and cost of the vehicles. This event examines the structure and dynamics of the EV battery supply chain, trade data limitations, and value addition in different regions.

events.name: Importance of EV Batteries
events.wd_description: EV batteries are essential for determining the range and cost of electric vehicles, influencing the overall performance and market adoption of EVs.
events.description: EV batteries are essential for determining the range and cost of electric vehicles, influencing the overall performance and market adoption of EVs.

events.name: Range Determination
events.wd_description: The capacity and efficiency of EV batteries directly affect the driving range of electric vehicles, making it a critical factor for consumer acceptance.
events.description: The capacity and efficiency of EV batteries directly affect the driving range of electric vehicles, making it a critical factor for consumer acceptance.

events.name: Cost Determination
events.wd_description: The cost of EV batteries significantly impacts the overall price of electric vehicles, influencing their market competitiveness.
events.description: The cost of EV batteries significantly impacts the overall price of electric vehicles, influencing their market competitiveness.

events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain Structure
events.wd_description: The supply chain for EV batteries involves multiple stages, including the production of cells, modules, and packs, with significant international trade and regional variations in production.
events.description: The supply chain for EV batteries involves multiple stages, including the production of cells, modules, and packs, with significant international trade and regional variations in production.

events.name: Cell Production
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion cells are produced primarily in the United States, China, Japan, and South Korea, with significant international trade.
events.description: Lithium-ion cells are produced primarily in the United States, China, Japan, and South Korea, with significant international trade.

events.name: Module Production
events.wd_description: Battery modules, consisting of assembled cells, are an intermediate stage in the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Battery modules, consisting of assembled cells, are an intermediate stage in the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Pack Production
events.wd_description: The final stage of EV battery production involves assembling modules into packs, which include electrical connections and cooling equipment.
events.description: The final stage of EV battery production involves assembling modules into packs, which include electrical connections and cooling equipment.

events.name: Trade Data Limitations
events.wd_description: The complex supply chain for lithium-ion batteries complicates the interpretation of international trade data, with different stages of the supply chain often classified under broad categories.
events.description: The complex supply chain for lithium-ion batteries complicates the interpretation of international trade data, with different stages of the supply chain often classified under broad categories.

events.name: Harmonized Tariff System (HTS)
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion battery cells and parts are classified under various HTS codes, complicating trade data analysis.
events.description: Lithium-ion battery cells and parts are classified under various HTS codes, complicating trade data analysis.

events.name: Statistical Classifications
events.wd_description: Different stages of the lithium-ion battery supply chain are imported under both general and specific statistical classifications, adding to the complexity of trade data.
events.description: Different stages of the lithium-ion battery supply chain are imported under both general and specific statistical classifications, adding to the complexity of trade data.

events.name: Value Addition in EV Batteries
events.wd_description: Various regions add significant value to lithium-ion batteries used in EVs, with the United States, China, and Japan being notable contributors.
events.description: Various regions add significant value to lithium-ion batteries used in EVs, with the United States, China, and Japan being notable contributors.

events.name: United States Value Addition
events.wd_description: The United States adds significant value to EV batteries, particularly in the pack assembly stage.
events.description: The United States adds significant value to EV batteries, particularly in the pack assembly stage.

events.name: China Value Addition
events.wd_description: China contributes a major portion of value to EV batteries, particularly through the production of cells and domestically produced EVs.
events.description: China contributes a major portion of value to EV batteries, particularly through the production of cells and domestically produced EVs.

events.name: Japan Value Addition
events.wd_description: Japan adds value to EV batteries primarily through the production of high-quality cells and modules.
events.description: Japan adds value to EV batteries primarily through the production of high-quality cells and modules.
